content: this dish/wash cloth is the perfect addition to your easter/spring decor the pattern includes instructions to make 2 different egg designs it looks great in any color combination making it a stylish and practical addition to your kitchen or bath essentials it also makes a great gift for family and friends it would be the perfect addition to those easter baskets for any age ***materials*** **➤yarn ** 100% cotton i used lily sugar n cream **➤yardage ** 70-90 yds **➤hooks ** 5 0 mm *contact the designer https //linktr ee/marshayarndoodles* this pattern is for personal use you may not alter sell copy transfer trade distribute or claim this pattern or its images as your own feel free to sell finished products made with this pattern please credit @marshayarndoodles as the pattern designer this pattern is property of @marshayarndoodles © 2024
